My Digital Projects

Kew Gardens

Using XML, Relax-NG, XSLT, and HTML to transcribe the short story Kew Gardens by the English author Virginia Woolf.

My role - Transcribing and marking up the short story by the English author Virginia Woolf in XML. Editing the scheme file. Transforming XML to HTML in XSLT.

A portfolio site that showcases projects made for various video games in EJS and CSS.
